key_risks: Legal disputes with EMC Corp. (now Dell Technologies) over trade secret misuse and patent disputes
Intense competition from dominant players like Dell EMC, NetApp, and HPE
Economic uncertainties and reduced IT spending impacting revenue growth
Dependence on flash storage adoption and potential slowdown in this trend
controversies: High-profile litigation with EMC Corp., including allegations of unfair business practices and misuse of proprietary information
social_issues: CEO Charlie Giancarlo's focus on addressing employee entitlement and organizational culture, which could impact employee morale and retention
